snippet: A new American plan for fighting the virus offers little in firm goals or money.
abstract: Editorial criticizes blueprint unveiled by Sec of State Hillary Clinton to fight spread of AIDS; holds plan fails to set appropriate goals and offers no new pledge of money to help nations carry out effective treatments and prevention methods.
lead_paragraph: A new American plan for fighting the virus offers little in firm goals or money.

headline.main: Promises on AIDS Are Not Enough
headline.print_headline: Promises on AIDS Are Not Enough

keywords.value: President's Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief
keywords.name: organizations
